speaker: Fenmire Marsh
line: The marsh breathes around you. Reeds lean inward, listening. Somewhere beneath the mud, stonework refuses to forget it was ever clean.

speaker: Vine-Bound Door
line: A sealed archway sinks into black water. Living vines knot across the runes, pulsing faintly—as if the lock is alive and hungry.

speaker: Fenmire Marsh
line: The runes aren’t a warning. They’re a contract.

choices.text: Study the runes and mark them down.
Offer a whispered vow to leave what you find undisturbed.
Cut the vines and test the seal.

speaker: Vine-Bound Door
line: The vines slacken for a heartbeat—then tighten again, as if amused by your attempt.

speaker: Fenmire Marsh
line: A soft click echoes from below. Not an opening—an acknowledgement.

speaker: Distant Frog-Croak
line: Two croaks. A pause. Then three more—like a signal you were not meant to recognize.

choices.text: Follow the signal into deeper marsh.
Leave before the mire decides you’ve stayed too long.
